  • Groups

Groups

Our music school offers unique classes on a variety of instruments, including guitar, saxophone, drums, flute and piano. These groups were created keeping in mind the latest trends and are highly rated among music schools.
  • Guitar
    Guitar classes offer a varied and innovative approach to learning. Students can learn different playing styles such as classical guitar, acoustic guitar or electric guitar and improve their skills under the guidance of experienced teachers.
  • Saxophone
    Saxophone groups can be an ideal choice for those who are interested in wind instruments. Our saxophone groups offer opportunities to develop technique, musical expression and improvisation on this unique instrument.
  • Drums
    For those who dream of becoming a drummer, our music school offers groups where students can learn to play drums in a variety of styles, including rock, jazz, funk and more. Our teachers, who are experienced drummers themselves, will help each student develop their skills and become a true master of the drums.
  • Flute
    Participation in flute groups will help students master the technique and expressiveness of playing this beautiful instrument. Our teachers, professional flutists, will help students develop their sense of musicianship and flute performance skills.
  • Piano
    For those who prefer the piano, we have groups where students can immerse themselves in the world of classical and modern music. Our pianist teachers will help each student master playing technique, musical interpretation and improvisation on the piano.
